title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Intermediate Mathematics Competency Enhancement for In-Service Engineers Using Visual Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain problem analysis methods using graphs, diagrams, and visual models to solve work-related mathematical problems
Learners can practice five techniques for visualizing mathematical concepts using smartphone-based tools
Learners achieve over 80% comprehension and application ability of visual learning materials (infographics, animations) through weekly formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
